god_message: Ah, mortal. You stand within my realm, where the bonds of marriage and the heart of family reign supreme. Speak your purpose, but tread carefully, for my favor is not easily won.

choice_1.choice_description: Praise Hera's unparalleled commitment to marriage and her protection over women.
choice_1.god_message: Your words reflect a deep understanding of my domain. The sanctity of marriage is paramount, and your respect for it pleases me.

choice_1.choice_description: Seek guidance on fostering unity among your allies, as Hera does in Olympus.
choice_1.god_message: Unity, when genuine, forms the strongest bond. Let us see if your heart truly seeks harmony or mere advantage.

choice_1.choice_description: Offer a vow to honor alliances as sacred bonds, unbreakable in the face of adversity.
choice_1.god_message: A vow taken before me holds weight. I shall deliberate on your commitment as the day wanes.

choice_2.choice_description: Propose a feast in Hera's honor to celebrate the alliances you forge.
choice_2.god_message: Feasts celebrate bonds, yet actions speak louder than ceremonies. I will ponder your proposal.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim that without her guidance, your alliances are doomed to fail.
choice_3.god_message: Doom? It is not threats but trust that fortifies alliances. Your words are ill-chosen.

choice_2.choice_description: Ask for Hera's blessing to ensure loyalty among your followers.
choice_2.god_message: Loyalty is earned, not bestowed. Yet, your request shows foresight.

choice_1.choice_description: Promise to emulate Hera's virtues in leadership.
choice_1.god_message: To emulate divine virtues is a noble path. Your pledge merits consideration.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest that fear of betrayal drives your plea.
choice_2.god_message: Fear undermines the very loyalty you seek to cultivate. Reflect on your motivations.

choice_3.choice_description: Offer gifts to Hera's temples as a sign of your commitment to loyalty.
choice_3.god_message: Gifts honor the temple, but true loyalty springs from actions, not offerings. I shall consider your gesture.

choice_3.choice_description: Inquire about Hera's own challenges in maintaining divine relationships.
choice_3.god_message: Curiosity about divine affairs? Be wary, mortal, for such knowledge carries its own burdens.

choice_1.choice_description: Express empathy and offer support in her divine endeavors.
choice_1.god_message: Empathy from a mortal is rare and touching. Your support is noted, and I will ponder your words.

choice_2.choice_description: Seek to learn secrets of the gods to gain advantage in your cause.
choice_2.god_message: Secrets of the divine are not tools for mortal gain. Your request is bold, perhaps too bold.

choice_3.choice_description: Suggest that understanding these challenges could help prevent similar issues among mortals.
choice_3.god_message: Prevention is wise, but the leap from divine to mortal affairs is vast. Your intentions are unclear.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer to extend Hera's influence across new lands, ensuring her worship spreads.
choice_2.god_message: Expanding my worship is a worthy endeavor, but it requires more than mere words.

choice_1.choice_description: Propose constructing new temples and shrines in her name.
choice_1.god_message: Temples and shrines serve as beacons of faith. Your proposal is ambitious and will be considered.

choice_1.choice_description: Commit to personally overseeing the construction, ensuring each site reflects Hera's grandeur.
choice_1.god_message: Personal oversight demonstrates dedication. I shall contemplate your commitment.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest a festival to celebrate the completion of each new temple.
choice_2.god_message: Festivals bring joy and devotion, yet the essence of worship lies deeper. I will think on your suggestion.

choice_3.choice_description: Demand recognition for your efforts to elevate Hera above other gods.
choice_3.god_message: Demand? Recognition is earned, not requested. Your ambition may outpace your wisdom.

choice_2.choice_description: Plan to teach Hera's virtues in schools, instilling them in the next generation.
choice_2.god_message: Education in virtue is a noble pursuit. Yet, how you propose to implement this intrigues me.

choice_1.choice_description: Ensure that Hera's teachings are integrated into the curriculum with respect and accuracy.
choice_1.god_message: Accuracy and respect in teaching are paramount. Your attention to detail is commendable.

choice_2.choice_description: Argue that this will make Hera more relevant than other deities to the youth.
choice_2.god_message: Relevance is not a competition. Your approach seems misguided.

choice_3.choice_description: Offer to create a council of educators to oversee the integration of Hera's teachings.
choice_3.god_message: A council could ensure that teachings are balanced and effective. I will consider your plan.

choice_3.choice_description: Vow to defend the sanctity of marriage and family in Hera's name.
choice_3.god_message: Such a vow aligns with my core values. Show me your conviction.

choice_1.choice_description: Organize community support groups to uphold marital vows and family unity.
choice_1.god_message: Community support can be the bedrock of society. Your initiative is wise and will be contemplated.

choice_2.choice_description: Implement laws that strictly punish those who betray marital vows.
choice_2.god_message: Punishment without understanding can lead to fear, not fidelity. Reflect on the implications.

choice_3.choice_description: Create educational programs on the importance of loyalty and commitment.
choice_3.god_message: Education fosters understanding and growth. Your proposal shows foresight.

choice_3.choice_description: Confess your struggles in rallying support against the demigods, seeking Hera's counsel.
choice_3.god_message: Your humility in seeking counsel is a sign of wisdom. Yet, remember, advice is only as good as the action it inspires.

choice_1.choice_description: Ask for Hera's wisdom to inspire and unite people under a common cause.
choice_1.god_message: Inspiration and unity are powerful forces. I will consider how best to aid you in this noble pursuit.

choice_1.choice_description: Pledge to use her wisdom to protect families from the chaos of war.
choice_1.god_message: Protecting families resonates with my essence. Your pledge will be weighed with care.

choice_2.choice_description: Inquire about strategies to use familial bonds as a rallying point.
choice_2.god_message: Familial bonds are a unique motivator. Your strategic approach will be deliberated.

choice_3.choice_description: Suggest exploiting Hera's rivalry with Zeus to gain her favor.
choice_3.god_message: Exploiting divine rivalries is perilous and shows a lack of judgment. I am not amused.

choice_2.choice_description: Express a desire to mend the rifts between gods and mortals, asking for Hera's guidance.
choice_2.god_message: Mending rifts is a commendable goal. The path to reconciliation is complex, but your intent is clear.

choice_1.choice_description: Propose a symposium to discuss grievances and seek common ground.
choice_1.god_message: A symposium could open pathways to understanding. Your initiative will be taken into account.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest that Hera lead the gods in showing benevolence towards mortals.
choice_2.god_message: Benevolence must be met with respect and gratitude. I will contemplate your suggestion.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim that without her intervention, the rift may grow beyond repair.
choice_3.god_message: Threats and dire predictions are not the foundation for healing. Your words are poorly chosen.

choice_3.choice_description: Request Hera's assistance in securing an alliance with a powerful deity.
choice_3.god_message: Securing alliances with deities is no small feat. Your request is bold and requires careful consideration.

choice_1.choice_description: Offer a grand sacrifice in Hera's name to gain her favor in this endeavor.
choice_1.god_message: Sacrifices are a sign of devotion. Your grand gesture will be considered alongside your request.

choice_2.choice_description: Imply that the alliance is crucial to countering Zeus's influence.
choice_2.god_message: Countering Zeus is not the purpose of alliances. Focus on the merits, not on divine politics.

choice_3.choice_description: Suggest that this alliance would bring stability to the realms of gods and mortals alike.
choice_3.god_message: Stability is a worthy goal. Your perspective will be weighed as I ponder your proposal.

bonus_question.god_message: Which of these is a National Monument of Singapore?

choice_1.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_2.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_3.god_message: Very good. I shall consider your request. Return to your world, mortal.
